title: class timings
content: what are the class timings for btech students. will we have enough time for club activities after classes or do they kick us out (day scholar).

comments.body: Lol, they don't kick you out just after classes !
okay!  what about the class timings?
This sem its 8-3:15 on some days, other days 8-1pm. It depends on your section 's timetable.
